contents.text: Welcome to Riviera Partners, San Francisco’s premier recruiting agency for world-class executive and engineering talent.
Press 1 to learn about our executive search services.
Press 1 to speak with a specialist about C-level and board placements.
Please hold while we connect you to our executive search team.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss an urgent C-level hire with your executive search team
Speak with an executive placement specialist about transitioning into C-level or board roles as a military veteran.
I need to speak with a specialist about recruiting a CTO with distributed systems expertise.
I need help recruiting a new C-level executive for our company.
I’m researching executive placement practices and need to speak with someone about C-level searches.

contents.text: Press 2 to hear about our retained search process and partnership model.
One moment please, we’re pulling up details on our retained search offerings.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for details on your retained search process and partnership terms
Learn about partnering with Riviera for retained search support to place veterans in executive positions.

I’d like to learn more about your retained search methodology and partnership model.

contents.text: Press 2 to explore our engineering talent solutions.
Press 1 to speak with a recruiter about software engineering hires.
Please hold while we connect you to our engineering recruitment team.

navigationGoals: I want to connect with someone about recruiting senior software engineers
Discuss recruiting software engineers for my veteran-led tech startup.
I'm looking to discuss sourcing senior full-stack engineers skilled in microservices architecture.

contents.text: Press 2 to learn about our technical assessment and candidate vetting services.
Thank you for holding. We’ll be right with you to discuss our assessment solutions.
